WorkExperiences.Description: As a senior technical expert on the Emta project, a 10-person team responsible for authenticating and authorizing users, I contributed to the following achievements:
Achievements: Improved the changeability of our software through the use of microservices patterns and clean architecture.
Implemented the core domain of our platform using a well-designed template.
Reduced coupling between services through the implementation of Domain-driven design.
Decreased direct service calling by adopting an event-driven approach.
Accelerated product delivery through the introduction of continuous integration and delivery.
Maintained regular communication with third-party companies to align our team's vision and mission with that of the company and our products, ultimately leading to successful launches.

WorkExperiences.Description: As a technical expert on the ICE project, a financial validation platform, I was responsible for preparing the test space and providing technical support to our partners, including Irancell, HamrahCard, Sad24, 724, Top, and others. My contributions to the project included:
Achievements: Implementing one PWA and two dashboards (admin and customer).
Improving the readability of new backend services through the use of C#, design patterns, and SOLID principles (migrating from VB.Net).
Increasing test coverage by 35% through the use of a TDD approach and writing unit tests.
Performing maintenance and improvements on BTB services.

WorkExperiences.Description: I was part of the team that launched Biar in February 2017, a company that provides retail goods online in partnership with HooshoDanesh Software Engineering. My contributions to the company included:
Achievements: Improved product delivery by developing a new version using clean architecture and a well-layered software design.
Increased store traffic by 25% through the creation of a mobile-friendly layout.
Enhanced the customer experience by implementing a client-side single-page application framework.
Improved price and product notifications through the use of SignalR.
Collaborated with engineers, designers, and product team members to reach project milestones.

Educations.Degree: Azad University Central Tehran Branch, Bachelor of Computer Science
